PHP:

<?php
/**
  * User: JianSuoQiYue
  * Date: 2017/07/04 22:48
  * Last: 2018-12-12 17:48:43
  */
declare(strict_types = 1);

namespace lib;

require ETC_PATH.'memcached.php';

class Memcached {

    /* @var $_link \Memcached */
    private $_link = NULL;

    private $_pre = '';

    /**
      * @param array $opt
      * @return Memcached
      * @throws \Exception
      */
    public static function get(array $opt = []): Memcached {
        $link = new Memcached();
        $link->connect($opt);
        return $link;
    }
}
